snippet: Despite requests by relatives of two men who died in the collapse four years ago, the mechanic, Tibor Varganyi, was sentenced to community service under a plea bargain.
abstract: Tibor Varganyi, mechanic who ordered a critical part for a tower crane that collapsed on the Upper East Side of Manhattan in 2008, killing two workers, is sentenced to community service as part of a plea deal that has left victims' families angry.
lead_paragraph: Despite requests by relatives of two men who died in the collapse four years ago, the mechanic, Tibor Varganyi, was sentenced to community service under a plea bargain.

headline.seo: Mechanic Avoids Jail for Role in 2008 Crane Collapse on East Side
headline.main: Mechanic Avoids Jail Time for Role in Crane Collapse
headline.print_headline: Mechanic Avoids Jail Time For Role in Crane Collapse
